job_purpose: Developing robust backend services and APIs for fleet management and autonomous vehicle control within a cross-functional team.
job_duties_and_responsibilities: Design and implement backend services, APIs, and functionalities to meet functional and non-functional requirements.
Lead the execution of complex user stories from design through deployment.
Contribute to technical design reviews and provide feedback on system architecture.
Ensure code quality through peer reviews, automated testing, and documentation.
Mentor junior developers and provide guidance on software design and best practices.
Integrate and adopt shared frameworks and libraries with Domain Engineers.
Identify and escalate technical risks or misalignments early to the Tech Lead.
required_qualifications: 5+ years’ experience as a Software Developer or in a similar role.
Expertise with C# .NET Core, Entity Framework, RabbitMQ.
Solid knowledge of unit testing frameworks.
Proficient in microservice architectures and containerization using Docker or Kubernetes.
company_details: MTR is seeking experienced Senior Back-End Developers to work on cutting-edge solutions for fleet management and autonomous vehicle control. The company values collaboration, innovation, and technical excellence in delivering high-quality, scalable software solutions.
